about_the_game:
In the world of Midgar, every life is a new beginning, but for Drassil, it is an opportunity to evolve and adapt like never before. Train under the guidance of your mother Freyja, until a fateful confrontation with the serpent Jormungand leads you on an epic journey across diverse continents and biomes.

Key Features:


Cycle of Reincarnation and Evolution: The central gameplay loop revolves around the unique concept of transferring life energy to the "Trees of Life." Upon death or meditation, Drassil can choose to reincarnate through these trees, inheriting new abilities adapted to the biome where he is reborn.

Adaptive Genetics: Utilize a detailed genetics system to adapt to a wide variety of environments, from hot deserts to cold tundras. With 6 chromosomes affecting different aspects of your character, customization is key.

8 Unique Biomes: Each biome presents its own challenges and creatures. From deserts to tundras and swamps, adaptation is vital for survival.

Complex Combat System: Experience deep combat with a wide variety of weapons and unique genetic abilities. Each enemy requires a different strategy, and your evolutionary abilities will play a pivotal role.

Day and Night System and Weather Cycle: Weather patterns and the day-night cycle affect the world's behavior around you, adding an additional layer of complexity.

Enveloping Narrative: Uncover pieces of Midgar's hidden history and your own mysterious past as you progress through your journey.

Evolve, adapt, and survive in this dynamic and ever-changing world. Are you ready to face the challenges of "Genimas: Life Reborn"?

Genetic Mechanics


Genetic Body: This gene changes Drassil's body to adapt it to different extreme environments such as extreme temperatures, high pressures, underwater, poisonous atmospheres.



Genetic Eyes: This gene activates Drassil's visual powers, allowing you to see invisible enemies, dangers, hidden paths, hidden places.



Left Arm Genetics: The genetics of the left arm transform the arm into different tools or weapons, which serve to solve the puzzles of the dungeons or defeat invulnerable enemies.



Leg Genetics: Leg genetics affect the character's movement in the world; they are designed to run faster, double-jump, move through quicksand without sinking, move on ice without slipping, and move fluidly underwater.

short_description: Embark on the adventure of a lifetime as Drassil, a warrior trained by Freyja on a remote island! With newly discovered genetic powers, travel to a hostile continent full of dangerous enemies and extreme environments. Your mission: to save civilization from an imminent calamity.
